example[0]: The engine is covered by a performance guarantee.
definition[1]: in selling a property or other investment, a guarantee by the seller that the property etc will reach a minimum level of profitability
example[1]: The sale of the ski resort is subject to performance guarantees that it will live up to expectations.
definition[2]: a contract between a supplier and a manufacturer that specifies conditions for the design and delivery of parts by the supplier
example[2]: Micro Compact Car has performance guarantees with the component companies that are partners on the project.
